name: Shipmozo Courier Tracking
author: Tensor Logistics Pvt Ltd

sections.description:
Shipmozo provides Shipment Tracking

Features

  1. Customers can track the shipment status of their orders on your website
  2. Track airwaybill number from multiple courier companies at one place
  3. Track complete shipping status from confirm order to order delivery
  4. Show shipment realtime status details
  5. 100% new files, this extension will NOT replace any core files
  6. Support 20+ Major Carriers:
    Bluedart, DTDC, Fedex India,Amazon, Delhivery, Ecom Express, DotZot, The Professional Couriers, and Xpress Bess

Benefits

  1. Improves User Experience

In case facing any issue while installation/any query contact us at info@shipmozo.com or login to https://www.shipmozo.com/
sections.installation:
1. Install shipmozo either via the WordPress.org plugin repository, or by uploading the files to your server
  2. After activating the plugin, Please follow instructions.
    3.Create a page in your wp-admin named as “Track Your Shipment Status” and paste the shortcode [shipmozo] in this page. Publish this page.
  3. Thats it!!

Localization

  • english
